content: You’ll find a new Shrine to rest at, not far to the left of the sealed door. Just beyond the Shrine is a cave entrance, guarded by a Rat Soldier and Rat Archer supporting him on some scaffolding. Skirt around the soldier to engage the archer first.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Sandgate_Village_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Sandgate Village Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Valley of Despair'.
The content is as follows:
You’ll find a new Shrine to rest at, not far to the left of the sealed door. Just beyond the Shrine is a cave entrance, guarded by a Rat Soldier and Rat Archer supporting him on some scaffolding. Skirt around the soldier to engage the archer first.
